mapper.insert: insert into holiday(huser_name, htype, hstart_date, hend_date, hcontent, half_day, approval, approval_date, count_date ,empno) VALUES (#{huserName}, #{htype},#{hstartDate},#{hendDate},#{hcontent},#{halfDay},#{approval}, null, #{countDate},#{empno});
mapper.select: select h.id as id, huser_name, DATE_FORMAT(hwrite_date, '%y.%m.%d') as hwrite_date, htype, date_format(hstart_date,'%y.%m.%d') as hstart_date, date_format(hend_date,'%y.%m.%d') as hend_date, hcontent, half_day,approval, count_date, h.empno as empno, e.total_holiday as total_holiday, date_format(approval_date,'%y.%m.%d') AS approval_date, rejection_reason FROM holiday h, employee_info e where h.empno = e.empno order by DATE_FORMAT(hwrite_date, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i:%m') desc;
